title: Personal Logo
content:
Hi I'm working on my personal stationery and I would like to hear what you think.  
This is my logo and business card. I am using a three folding format.  
After I added the pattern into the card, I feel my logo is too heavy or traditional.

Thank you,

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [card14-2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108172719/http:/typophile.com/files/card14-2.png) | 4.93 KB |
author: kobito7

comments.content:
Like the colors and use of whitespace.

What is the logo though? I was inclined to look for your initials in it but looks more abstract.

I appreciate your feedback.

T and K are in the logo. The both logo and pattern were derived from bamboo, which I have wanted to use for my logo. I love the pattern inside of the card (right side), but I feel it doesn't go with the logo because the logo has solid colors while the patterns are just lines. I am trying to edit the logo to have more organic shapes, but I still feel it is heavy.

To me it says: stained glass. The logo, not the pattern on your business card which does resemble to a vertically cut bamboo stick.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
_Robert Koritnik_
